event1.title: Digital Detox Meditation. Do you need a moment off screen|? To have a minute for yourself which might contribute in making the world better as well? Join us for a guided meditation session. Please come with comfortable clothes and welling to stop and reflect. See you!

event2.title: Life of a Digital Transformation Designers will Show & Tell about their work. The Digital Transformation Designers of the Digital Society School will show and tell about their work. One can expect a variety of installations, prototypes and visualisations representing research output of last year.

event9.title: Get Energized, Digital Society School Snacks & Energizers An energizer is an energy-booster. It is commonly used as an ice-breaker to get to know people and meet who is around you. In a working environment, it can be used to clear everybodyâ€™s heads of negative energy and take a break. Energizers play a vital part in the SCREAM methodology developed by the Digital Society School and are a great way to create a community and safe working environment.
